mean_cn: n. （报刊的）标题，（插图、照片等的）说明文字，（电影）字幕
mean_en: a sentence or group of words that is written on or next to a picture to explain what is being shown
word_etyma: capt拿，抓，握住 + ion 表示行为、过程或结果 → n.(报刊的)标题;(插图、照片等的)说明文字；(电影)字幕
sentence: A caption is very helpful for understanding charts.
sentence_trans: 说明文字对于理解图表很有帮助。
